root.name: Pride of Nations
root.description: OVERVIEWIn Pride of Nations players will take control of a country and lead it from 1850-1920. Through the course of the game the goal is to amass prestige through colonization, industrialization, and military conquest. Like other AGEOD games Pride of Nations is a turned based game. Playable Nations:Great BritainFranceRussiaPrussiaAustria-HungarySardinia-Piedmont (Italy)United StatesJapanDLC:There are four pieces of DLC that cover a specific war or era.The Spanish-American War 1898The Franco Prussian War 1870-1871The American Civil War (starts in 1862)The Scramble for Africa Campaign 1880 System RequirementsOS: Windows XP/Vista/ Windows 7Processor: Pentium® IV 1800+ MHzMemory: 1 GB (XP) or 2 GB (Vista or W7)Hard Disk Space: 3 GB free on hard diskVideo Card: 512 Mb V-RAM or betterDirectX®: 9.0c or moreSound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound cardAdditional: Internet Connection required for multiplayer
